subhead: The summit between the two economic superpowers, intended to celebrate 50 years of diplomatic ties, has highlighted the frustrations of the European Union, which faces a €300 billion trade deficit with China.

title: Hulk Hogan, professional wrestling icon, dies at age 71
subhead: Hogan, born Terry Bollea, was perhaps the biggest star in WWE's history, and also built a successful entertainment career, starring in multiple films and TV shows. He died Thursday morning of cardiac arrest.

title: From games to reminders to drink water: The rise of 'streaks,' rewards that keep you hooked
subhead: The use of tracking meters, popularized by apps such as Duolingo and Snapchat to reward their most dedicated users, has become widespread. However, addiction specialists and psychologists have raised concerns.

title: Climate: What does it mean if we can no longer limit warming to 1.5°C?
subhead: Some scientists now believe that humanity will no longer be able to meet the most ambitious target set by the Paris Agreement in 2015. However, this goal still serves an important purpose in helping to avoid the most devastating impacts of climate change.

title: Israeli government openly aims to depopulate Gaza
subhead: Benjamin Netanyahu's coalition is using hunger as a weapon to pressure Palestinians to abandon their land. Its objective is to concentrate them in a so-called 'humanitarian city' in the south of the enclave, as a precursor to their possible transfer to foreign countries.

title: AI: Trump unleashes Silicon Valley to secure 'global dominance' for the US
subhead: US President Donald Trump presented an action plan on Wednesday, July 23, aimed at accelerating the large-scale adoption of AI technology by easing infrastructure construction and removing regulatory barriers.

title: From Mark Zuckerberg to Elon Musk, the Palo Alto 'boys' club'
subhead: 'Tech Oligarchs' (4/6). The top executives of Silicon Valley are steeped in a predominantly male 'geek culture,' one that has been marked by heated debates over the role of women for the past 20 years.
